description: Try our easy to follow Blueberry & Lemon Mug Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Mug cake,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Blueberry,Tree nut free,Healthier Easier,Lemon,Winter,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Microwave,High tea,Soy free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Blueberry & Lemon Mug Cake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup frozen blueberries, reserve a few for topping

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients (except reserved blueberries) and divide between 2 microwave-proof mugs and microwave for 90 seconds.
Scatter reserved blueberries on top. Microwave for a further 40 seconds or until cooked through. Serve warm.
